label.text: Play Nadeo maps with any car of your wish. Combinations are endless.

Because of Maniaplanet limitations, we have to follow some rules. Use CREATE button to setup and manage cars you wanna use. Once you do that, you have 5 slots to put your cars into. Type the exact full car name with extension, like $oLowGravity.Item.Gbx$z. Remember that if you misspell the car name, the whole gamemode will crash immediately.
